abort.already_in_progress: There is already a configuration flow in progress for this device

finish.title: Choose a name for the device

reset.description:
Your device is locked for authentication. Follow the instructions to unlock it:
1. Factory reset the device.
2. Use the official app to add the device to your local network.
3. Stop. Do not finish the setup. Close the app.
4. Click Submit.
reset.title: Unlock the device

unlock.description: Your device is locked. This can lead to authentication problems in Home Assistant. Would you like to unlock it?
unlock.title: Unlock the device (optional)
